attributes.action: substantially increase tax on alcohol and use this to reduce car fuel duty tax
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Alcohol is a luxury and too cheap,petrol is an essential and is taxed too heavily. I suggest a rebalance
